-1.title: To Have or not to Have
-1.plot: Eager to make it up to Jeremy for forgetting their anniversary, Chantal coaxes Jeremy to some steamy make up sex, however luck's not on their side as all forms of contraception run out in the house. In heated carelessness, they decide to do it anyway and all is fine till Chantal misses her period and starts to feel a little nauseous. Perhaps it was just the clam chowder - or perhaps it isn't. But all this leads to a big step towards the possibility of an earlier than expected parenthood.

imdb.plot outline: It's a blissful and exciting time for the young, affectionate couple as Jeremy (played by Benjamin Heng), a straight laced accountant and Chantal (played by Sheena Chan), a struggling fashion designer, get married and settle down into their new home. But like all things new and unfamiliar, there're lots of surprises at every corner as these love birds begin to learn new things about each other, some not so pretty and some just downright shocking . Add to that Jeremy's best friend, Ryan, a boisterous bar owner (played by Roshan Gidwani), his sister Melissa (played by Joyce Ng) who manages to pop out at the worst moments, Chantal's best friend, Fran (played by Gilian Tan) who never seems to be sober, and Max (played by Asher Su), Chantal's flamboyant business partner and we've got 13 rocking episodes of couple comedy that'll drive everybody a little crazy.
imdb.title: Drive Me Crazy
